properties.name: weasel.provider.refresh.scheduled.cron
properties.description: The Cron time description for when to refresh.

properties.name: weasel.provider.refresh.scheduled.repositories
properties.description: Repositories to refresh on a scheduled basis.

properties.name: weasel.provider.refresh.scheduled.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable scheduled refresh or not.

properties.name: weasel.provider.refresh.web.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable web-initiated refresh or not.
